responses.Falsely Accused: I'm going to stop talking to you now.
responses.Big Footprint: Could be mine. %NPC has similar sized feet.
responses.Bag: I don't bring a bag in. %NPC lost theirs earlier.
responses.Lipstick: I don't use lipstick. %NPC always does.
responses.Right Handed: Yes, I do normally use my right hand. I think %NPC uses a special pen.
responses.Dark Hair: My hair is a dark colour, but so is %NPC's.
responses.Erotic Novel: Not my thing. I think %NPC helped write it.
responses.Broken Mobile Phone: Oh I'm sorry, I don't recognise it. Try %NPC.
responses.Knife: I am a cook, but I don't carry my knives around. Try %NPC.
responses.Energy Drink: %NPC and I drink that a lot.
responses.Red Scarf: I don't wear a scarf. Try asking %NPC.
responses.Hockey Stick: I don't play hockey. %NPC plays a lot of sport, ask them.
responses.Hardware Magazine: %NPC and I read that a lot.
responses.Receipt: I think %NPC eats there a lot.
responses.USB Stick: Not a fan of history. %NPC talks about it a lot.

motives.Adam: Yeah I killed him. He tried to talk to me once. Screw that.
motives.Diana: Yeah I killed her. She stole my watch. I liked that watch.
motives.Horatio: Yeah I killed him. Who calls their son Horatio? It was a mercy, trust me.
motives.Lily: Yeah I killed her. She tried to kill me once. ...Actually, that may have been Diana...
motives.Mary: Yeah I killed her. She's so mean.
motives.Mike: Yeah I killed him. He's way too nice. He's hiding something.
motives.Roger: Yeah I killed him. I liked his hat. I wanted his hat.
motives.Will: Yeah I killed him. He looks too much like Adam. I was getting confused.
